summary: Aggregates every tensor output from the OneFormer architecture—encoder, pixel decoder and transformer decoder hidden states, object and contrastive queries, mask and class logits, auxiliary predictions, task token and attention maps—into a single structured object for easy access during training and inference.
business_intent: Provide a unified output container that supplies all necessary intermediate and final representations for loss calculation, segmentation mask generation, classification, contrastive learning and model introspection.
